      • setOnDialogButtonClickListener

        public void setOnDialogButtonClickListener(AdidasBasicDialog.OnDialogButtonClickListener listener)
        Set a dialog button click listener. If you don't set this listener, the default behavior is to dismiss the dialog on OK or Cancel click. If you set the listener, both default behaviors are ignored.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to execute on click of the OK and Cancel buttons. This listener should be an Activity that implements AdidasBasicDialog#OnDialogButtonClickListener
